presets.title: Default 4.3 Filter settings
presets.author: Betaflight
description: Resets Filter settings to 4.3 defaults

presets.title: the Karate array
presets.author: sugarK
description: the Karate fitler array as developed by @CTZsoonze and @sugarK for 4.3 using @karateBrot's rpm cross fade code.
NOTE this needs bidirectional Dshot support and RPM filtering active to use. DO NOT ATEMPT TO USE WITH OUT RPM FILTERING!
This filtering array will work with most 5" race and freesytle builds that have a solid airframe and motors in good condition.
Follow the usual process of hover testing and safely checking out your tune before using. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK.

presets.title: SDFT Filter (No RPM) | Clean
presets.author: Ryan Rochford (mouseFPV) (Rochford77)
description: mouseFPV SDFT Filter for clean builds, good for quads with no bi_driectional DSHOT and whoops

presets.title: Clean Build RPM Filter (4"-5")
presets.author: Ryan Rochford (mouseFPV) (Rochford77)
description: 4 Inch to 5 Inch RPM Filter for Clean Builds
Requires 8k PIDLoop! If using F4 and 4k PIDLoop, select option for F4 @ 4k to prevent aliasing!
presets.warning: This Sets Motor Poles to 14 and Requires RPM filtering and DShot telemetry!

presets.title: Toothpick 3 Clean Build RPM Filter
presets.author: Ryan Rochford (mouseFPV) (Rochford77)
description: RPM Filter setup for "Clean" Toothpick Builds.
presets.warning: This Sets Motor Poles to 12 and Requires RPM filtering and DShot telemetry!

presets.title: SDFT Whoop Filter (No RPM) | Clean
presets.author: Ryan Rochford (mouseFPV) (Rochford77)
description: mouseFPV SDFT Filter for clean builds, specifically built for whoops, no bi_driectional DSHOT
I am using this on an f411 whoop, 120OC, DSHOT300, and 4k loop, bi_driectional off.

presets.title: Toothpick 3 Dirty Build RPM Filter
presets.author: Ryan Rochford (mouseFPV) (Rochford77)
description: RPM Filter setup for "Dirty" Toothpick Builds.
Use This if you have issues running the "Clean" filter.
presets.warning: This Sets Motor Poles to 12 and Requires RPM filtering and DShot telemetry!

presets.title: Toothpick 3 Braced Extreme RPM Filter
presets.author: Ryan Rochford (mouseFPV) (Rochford77)
description: RPM Filter for Toothpicks and Digipicks with Braces (or amazing Resonant Performance)
NOT APPROPRIATE FOR A TP3 Frame *Without* Carbon Braces
Only flash If you have a Braced TP3 or an AOS-T3
Requires 8k PIDLoop! If using F4 and 4k PIDLoop, select option for F4 @ 4k to prevent aliasing!
THIS IS FOR BRACED Toothpicks ONLY.
presets.warning: THIS IS FOR BRACED Toothpicks ONLY. This Sets Motor Poles to 12 and Requires RPM filtering and DShot telemetry!

presets.title: SDFT Filter (No RPM) | Dirty
presets.author: Ryan Rochford (mouseFPV) (Rochford77)
description: SDFT Filter for dirty builds, good for quads with no bi_driectional DSHOT and whoops.

presets.title: Headsup racing rates
presets.author: Evan Turner (Headsup)
description: Famous 533 racing rates by Headsup - Evan Turner.
Betaflight type of rates with 533 degrees/sec max on all three axes.
Evan Turner - MultiGP Champion 2021, 2019 and 2018. MultiGP Internation Open Champion 2021 and 2021 DRL pilot.
Optional checkbox provides almost identical rates, but with the type = ACTUAL.

presets.title: Default rates
presets.author: Betaflight
description: Default Betaflight rates - ACTUAL
Will be applied for the currently selected rate profile
TPA values are not included
Throttle limit and curve are not included

presets.title: Default 4.3 RC link settings
presets.author: Betaflight
description: Resets all RC Link related parameters to 4.3 defaults

options.name: Whole pack voltage readings to Tx

presets.title: ELRS 250hz mouseFPV
presets.author: Ryan Rochford (mouseFPV) (Rochford77)
description: Basic RC link settings for a 250hz ELRS link via CRSF
make ABSOLUTELY SURE that the OpenTx or EdgeTx Hardware ADC Filter is un-checked!
check that you are using a compatible version of EdgeTx or OpenTx!
Voltage option is for OpenTx telemetry back to the transmitter, default is per cell, option whole pack.

presets.title: GHST Solid 250hz mouseFPV
presets.author: Ryan Rochford (mouseFPV) (Rochford77)
description: Basic RC link settings for a Solid250 link via GHST
make ABSOLUTELY SURE that the OpenTx or EdgeTx Hardware ADC Filter is un-checked!
check that you are using a compatible version of EdgeTx or OpenTx!

presets.title: RedPine SPI Whoop
presets.author: Ryan Rochford (mouseFPV) (Rochford77)
description: Redpine SPI
make ABSOLUTELY SURE that the OpenTx or EdgeTx Hardware ADC Filter is un-checked!
check that you are using a compatible version of EdgeTx or OpenTx!

presets.title: Default 4.3 RC smoothing settings
presets.author: Betaflight
description: Resets RC Smoothing settings to 4.3 defaults

presets.title: Freestyle RC smoothing
presets.author: ctzsnooze
description: RC smoothing settings for Freestyle footage.
Fixed cutoff frequency for consistent, responsive results over a wide range of RC link frequencies. Auto-smoothing cutoff values are over-ridden by the fixed cutoff values.
There should be no need to turn off feedforward or to enable transition, beause the jitter reduction provides dynamic attenuation of feedforward whenever the sticks move slowly.
Option: Actual Rates, with centre sensitivity around 60 and 750 deg/s max.

presets.title: Smooth Freestyle
presets.author: Ryan Rochford (mouseFPV) (Rochford77)
description: RC_Smoothing for Smooth Freestyle on static links 150hz+

presets.title: Smooth Racer
presets.author: Ryan Rochford (mouseFPV) (Rochford77)
description: For Smooth Racing, not too jumpy, also not too laggy

presets.title: Tune defaults for Basic 4.3 TUNES
presets.author: Betaflight
description: Resets all Basic 4.3 Tune category parameters to defaults
WARNING: Overwrites all settings mentioned below to defaults.  The User cannot retain their previous values.
WARNING: Tune authors must explicitly set these values to something other than default, if needed for the tune.
DOES NOT reset rates, filters, rc_smoothing, and many other parameters.

presets.title: Freestyle 5" Karate Style
presets.author: sugarK
description: This is the sugarK freestyle tune, its been test over the last few months, on 5" quads by members of the UAVtech discord.. This is a starting point tune and has siders active so you can fine tune it easily. In saying that its still a pretty spicy tune and use at your own risk.
THIS PRESET IS NOT SUITABLE FOR RACING QUADS AND MAY RESULT IN FLY AWAYS OR BURNT MOTORS

Things to note.. YOU HAVE TO USE RPM FILTERING WITH THIS TUNE, failure to do so might result in fire and regarding Dshot600,  if your setup has errors in the motor tab using bidirectional Dshot then change to 8k/4k and dshot300.

Also this should be applied to a clean flash after you've setup your rates, swtiches, vtx tables etc. To test arm the quad with props on, it should sound clean with no grinding, if it passes that then hover test and check motor temps.
If any thing is off don't fly it!!

SECOND NOTE.... Radio links.. 1. Make sure your radio system is totally up to date using either Edgetx or Opentx and your ADC in the hardware page is OFF 2. Go to the radio presets and apply the correct setup for your system and link speed.

presets.title: FPVCycle Prototype 5 | 6s
presets.author: Ryan Rochford (mouseFPV) (Rochford77)
description: Tune for FPVCycle Prototype 5
This is a tune only, NOT filters
*Use with 5" Clean Build RPM Filter
*Works best with my Smooth Freestyle RC Smoothing
*Works best with my Rates
Recommended ESC: 30% Rampup | 23deg Timing | 48k PWM
*Choose Option for Heavy action cam if using hero 8/9/10
*Choose Option for Dynamic Idle For Best Results
*Choose Option over 1800kv if over 1800kv on 6s

presets.title: Braced Digipick 3 3s Extreme
presets.author: Ryan Rochford (mouseFPV) (Rochford77)
description: Tune for Digital FPVCycle Toothpick 3 with 13mm 5000kv motors on 3s 115g+
NOT APPROPRIATE FOR A TP3 Frame *Without* Carbon Braces
Only flash If you have a Braced TP3 or an AOS-T3
This is a tune only, NOT filters
*Use with Toothpick 3 Braced Extreme RPM Filter
*Works best with my Smooth Freestyle RC Smoothing
*Works best with my Rates
Recommended ESC: 30% Rampup | 23deg Timing | 48k PWM
*Choose Option for Dynamic Idle For Best Results
presets.warning: This tune has very high DGain. DO NOT Flash without braces. Dynamic Idle Requires DShot telemetry!

presets.title: 4 Inch 2204 3450kv 3s/4s (Fouride)
presets.author: Ryan Rochford (mouseFPV) (Rochford77)
description: This is for a 4" 2204 quad
This is a tune only, NOT filters
*Use with 5" Clean Build RPM Filter
*Works best with my Smooth Freestyle RC Smoothing
*Works best with my Rates
Recommended ESC: 30% Rampup | 23deg Timing | 48k PWM
*Cell count selections Intended for 3450kv 2203/4 motor
*Cell count selections controll auto_cell_count and motor output
Dont choose any cell count if you have other motors...
*AUW Selections boost pids to make up for weight
*Choose Option for Dynamic Idle For Best Results

presets.title: QAV-S | 6s
presets.author: Ryan Rochford (mouseFPV) (Rochford77)
description: Tune for Lumenier QAV-S bardwell edition on 6s

*Use with 5" Clean Build RPM Filter

*Works best with my Rates
Recommended ESC: 30% Rampup | 23deg Timing | 48k PWM

*Choose Option for Heavy action cam if using hero 8/9/10
*Choose Option for Dynamic Idle For Best Results
*Choose Option over 1800kv if over 1800kv on 6s

presets.title: Whoop
presets.author: Ryan Rochford (mouseFPV) (Rochford77)
description: Tune for 1s whoops, 17000-19500kv. Select Option if over 20000kv
This is a tune only, NOT filters
*Use with SDFT Filter (No RPM)
*If Using f411 whoop and SDFT (no RPM) Overclock CPU to 120mhz and use dshot600/8k

Recommended 48k PWM
